item.title: How to convert an existing project to MicroFrontend with Module Federation
item.description: Nowadays, I joined a frontend team in a new company in Singapore, the project is based on monorepo (you can find more about monorepo here) and the tech lead maintains the project very well, keeping updating the main libraries to the latest version and keeping an eye on the new technology to improve the solution and codes. When I invested the project, I found the project was not just a monorepo, but also a monolith frontend project which involves other project which is kidn of a historical problem.
